section.name: Generating the metadoc file
section.p: Once you have configured your installation to talk to your database, you can make the web application generate the skeleton of the metadoc file by analysis of the database. This operation will fill in all the structural details concerning the database schema leaving you to add the scientific metadata.

Go to the web-application pages with a web browser. Follow the link marked "generate template metadoc" in the left-hand side-bar. This will download the metadoc file into your browser. Use the "save as" command in the browser to sabe the result into your configuration directory as the file metadoc.xml. (The file-name and location is actually arbitrary, but it has to match what you wrote in astrogrid.properties and it helps to follow the naming convention.)
